about_the_game:
The heartstone of Henki shapeshifters has shattered, scattering fragments across Taival. The art of shapeshifting is forgotten, until you stumble upon the last Henki. Together you journey the handcrafted blocky world with up to 4 players and cross paths with the locals in a quest to bring back the fragments from wherever – or whoever – they may be.

Taival is a co-op adventure that blends classic RPG elements with a unique shapeshifting companion and a charming blocky art style. Central to gameplay is the Henki companion, capable of shapeshifting into various combat and mount forms discovered throughout the world. Together with the tiny sidekick, the player traverses a handcrafted open world, engaging in combat, narrative quests, and character progression via skill trees and loot. Multiplayer is supported with up to 4 players online as well as locally with split-screen - simultaneously!  

EXPLORE THE REALMS OF TAIVAL

Discover a colourful world filled with multiple, seamlessly connected realms. Each area offers something new to enjoy with unique environments and inhabitants.

SHAPESHIFTING COMPANION

Whether in battle or exploring, you’re accompanied by a shapeshifting companion, a Henki. Your Henki companion can take forms of creatures you encounter in Taival. Your companion grows with you, unlocking new abilities and features.

UP TO 4 PLAYER CO-OP

Adventure with any combination of local split screen and online players. Up to four players can join in!

CHARMING BLOCKY ART STYLE

Enjoy a handcrafted world built with a charming, voxel-style blocky art design.

WELCOMING GAMEPLAY

Taival offers gameplay that's easy to pick up for newcomers yet offers challenge and engaging mechanincs for seasoned veterans

Key Features:

  • Handcrafted open world built with a charming blocky art style

  • Shapeshifting companion able to shift into the form of any creature you find in the world - collect them all!

  • Unlockable mount forms for your companion for fast exploration

  • Explore procedurally generated dungeons around the world for randomized loot and bosses creating replay value

  • Split screen and online co-op, allowing you to experience Taival with friends both locally and online in the same game session

  • Progress your character and your companion through unlockable abilities and skill trees - even for fishing!

  • Engage in group dialogue when making important quest choices together

  • Upgradeable player homes that can be placed in the world

  • The RPG essentials: combat, quests, storyline, loot, character creation, replay value, leveling up and exploration
